react/boolean-prop-naming.name: react/boolean-prop-naming
react/boolean-prop-naming.description: 布尔值类型的 propTypes 的 name 必须为 is 或 has 开头
react/boolean-prop-naming.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

react/default-props-match-prop-types.name: react/default-props-match-prop-types
react/default-props-match-prop-types.description: 一个 defaultProps 必须有对应的 propTypes
react/default-props-match-prop-types.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

react/destructuring-assignment.name: react/destructuring-assignment
react/destructuring-assignment.description: props, state, context 必须用解构赋值

react/display-name.name: react/display-name
react/display-name.description: 组件必须有 displayName 属性

react/forbid-component-props.name: react/forbid-component-props
react/forbid-component-props.description: 禁止在自定义组件中使用指定的 props

react/forbid-dom-props.name: react/forbid-dom-props
react/forbid-dom-props.description: 禁止在 dom 组件中使用指定的 props

react/forbid-foreign-prop-types.name: react/forbid-foreign-prop-types
react/forbid-foreign-prop-types.description: 禁止使用另一个组件的 propTypes
react/forbid-foreign-prop-types.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

react/forbid-prop-types.name: react/forbid-prop-types
react/forbid-prop-types.description: 禁止使用 PropTypes.any PropTypes.array 和 PropTypes.object
react/forbid-prop-types.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

react/function-component-definition.name: react/function-component-definition
react/function-component-definition.description: 限制函数式组件的函数形式（函数声明、函数表达式或箭头函数）
react/function-component-definition.reason: 一些场景还不能覆盖，如 export default function，自动修复功能在 ts 中有些问题

react/jsx-boolean-value.name: react/jsx-boolean-value
react/jsx-boolean-value.description: 布尔值的属性必须显式的声明值为 true

react/jsx-curly-brace-presence.name: react/jsx-curly-brace-presence
react/jsx-curly-brace-presence.description: 禁止 jsx 中使用无用的引号
react/jsx-curly-brace-presence.badExample: <App prop=eact/jsx-curly-brace-presence)">{'foo'}>{'Hello World'}</App>;
react/jsx-curly-brace-presence.goodExample: <App prop="foo">Hello World</App>;

react/jsx-fragments.name: react/jsx-fragments
react/jsx-fragments.description: 必须使用 <></> 而不是 React.Fragment
react/jsx-fragments.reason: <></> 不需要额外引入 Fragment 组件
react/jsx-fragments.badExample: <React.Fragment></React.Fragment>;
react/jsx-fragments.goodExample: <></>; <div> {[1, 2, 3].map((value) => ( <React.Fragment key={value}>{value}</React.Fragment> ))} </div>;

react/jsx-handler-names.name: react/jsx-handler-names
react/jsx-handler-names.description: handler 的名称必须是 onXXX 或 handleXXX

react/jsx-key.name: react/jsx-key
react/jsx-key.description: 数组中的 jsx 必须有 key
react/jsx-key.badExample: <ul> {[1, 2, 3].map((value) => ( <li>{value}</li> ))} </ul>; <div> {[1, 2, 3].map((value) => ( <>{value}</> ))} </div>;
react/jsx-key.goodExample: <ul> {[1, 2, 3].map((value) => ( <li key={value}>{value}</li> ))} </ul>; <div> {[1, 2, 3].map((value) => ( <React.Fragment key={value}>{value}</React.Fragment> ))} </div>;

react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes.name: react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes
react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes.description: 禁止在 jsx 中使用像注释的字符串
react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes.badExample: <div>// empty div</div>; <div>/* empty div */</div>;
react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes.goodExample: <div>{/* empty div */}</div>; <div /* empty div */ />;

react/jsx-no-duplicate-props.name: react/jsx-no-duplicate-props
react/jsx-no-duplicate-props.badExample: <Foo name="foo" name="bar" />;
react/jsx-no-duplicate-props.goodExample: <Foo name="foo" />;

react/jsx-no-literals.name: react/jsx-no-literals
react/jsx-no-literals.description: 禁止在 jsx 中出现字符串

react/jsx-no-script-url.name: react/jsx-no-script-url
react/jsx-no-script-url.reason: React 已经有 warning 了，并且会在将来禁止此类属性值
react/jsx-no-script-url.badExample: <a href="javascript:void(0);"></a>;
react/jsx-no-script-url.goodExample: <a href="#" onClick={(e) => { e.preventDefault(); }} ></a>;

react/jsx-no-undef.name: react/jsx-no-undef
react/jsx-no-undef.description: 禁止使用未定义的组件
react/jsx-no-undef.badExample: <Foo />;
react/jsx-no-undef.goodExample: import Foo from './Foo'; <Foo />;

react/jsx-no-useless-fragment.name: react/jsx-no-useless-fragment
react/jsx-no-useless-fragment.description: 禁止无意义的 Fragment 组件
react/jsx-no-useless-fragment.badExample: <></>; <> <Foo /> </>;
react/jsx-no-useless-fragment.goodExample: <>foo</>; <React.Fragment key="foo"> <Foo /> </React.Fragment>;

react/jsx-pascal-case.name: react/jsx-pascal-case
react/jsx-pascal-case.description: 组件的名称必须符合 PascalCase
react/jsx-pascal-case.badExample: <FOO />; <FOO_BAR />;
react/jsx-pascal-case.goodExample: <Foo />; <FooBar />;

react/jsx-uses-react.name: react/jsx-uses-react
react/jsx-uses-react.description: 修复 React 被误报为未使用的变量的问题（仅在开启 no-unused-vars 时有效）
react/jsx-uses-react.badExample: /* eslint no-unused-vars: "error", react/jsx-uses-react: "off" */ import React from 'react'; <div />;
react/jsx-uses-react.goodExample: /* eslint no-unused-vars: "error" */ import React from 'react'; <div />;

react/jsx-uses-vars.name: react/jsx-uses-vars
react/jsx-uses-vars.description: 修复 no-unused-vars 不检查 jsx 的问题
react/jsx-uses-vars.badExample: /* eslint no-unused-vars: "error", "react/jsx-uses-vars": "off" */ import Foo from './Foo'; <Foo />;
react/jsx-uses-vars.goodExample: /* eslint no-unused-vars: "error" */ import Foo from './Foo'; <Foo />;

react/no-access-state-in-setstate.name: react/no-access-state-in-setstate
react/no-access-state-in-setstate.description: 禁止在 setState 中使用 this.state

react/no-adjacent-inline-elements.name: react/no-adjacent-inline-elements
react/no-adjacent-inline-elements.description: 两个 inline 元素之间必须有空格，否则视觉上它们就贴在一起了
react/no-adjacent-inline-elements.reason: 这是样式的问题，不应该由空格约束

react/no-array-index-key.name: react/no-array-index-key
react/no-array-index-key.description: 禁止使用数组的索引作为 key

react/no-children-prop.name: react/no-children-prop
react/no-children-prop.description: 禁止将 children 作为一个 prop
react/no-children-prop.badExample: <div children="Hello World" />; <Foo children={<Bar />} />;
react/no-children-prop.goodExample: <div>Hello World</div>; <Foo> <Bar /> </Foo>;

react/no-danger-with-children.name: react/no-danger-with-children
react/no-danger-with-children.description: 禁止在使用了 dangerouslySetInnerHTML 的组件内添加 children
react/no-danger-with-children.badExample: <div dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: 'Foo' }}>Hello World</div>;
react/no-danger-with-children.goodExample: <div dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: 'Foo' }} />; <div>Hello World</div>;

react/no-deprecated.name: react/no-deprecated
react/no-deprecated.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 api
react/no-deprecated.badExample: React.render(<Foo />, app); class Foo extends React.Component { componentWillMount() {} componentWillReceiveProps() {} componentWillUpdate() {} }
react/no-deprecated.goodExample: ReactDOM.render(<Foo />, app); class Foo extends React.Component {}

react/no-did-mount-set-state.name: react/no-did-mount-set-state
react/no-did-mount-set-state.description: 禁止在 componentDidMount 里使用 setState
react/no-did-mount-set-state.reason: 同构应用需要在 didMount 里使用 setState

react/no-did-update-set-state.name: react/no-did-update-set-state
react/no-did-update-set-state.description: 禁止在 componentDidUpdate 里使用 setState
react/no-did-update-set-state.badExample: class Foo extends React.Component { componentDidUpdate() { this.setState(); } }
react/no-did-update-set-state.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { componentDidUpdate() {} }

react/no-direct-mutation-state.name: react/no-direct-mutation-state
react/no-direct-mutation-state.badExample: class Foo extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { this.state.name = 'foo'; } }
react/no-direct-mutation-state.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { constructor() { this.state = { name: 'foo', }; } }

react/no-find-dom-node.name: react/no-find-dom-node
react/no-find-dom-node.badExample: class Foo extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { const root = findDOMNode(this); } render() { return <div />; } }
react/no-find-dom-node.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { constructor() { this.myRef = React.createRef(); } render() { return <div ref={this.myRef} />; } }

react/no-is-mounted.name: react/no-is-mounted
react/no-is-mounted.badExample: class Foo extends React.Component { updateName() { if (this.isMounted()) { this.setState({}); } } }
react/no-is-mounted.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { updateName() { if (this._isMounted) { this.setState({}); } } }

react/no-multi-comp.name: react/no-multi-comp
react/no-multi-comp.description: 禁止在一个文件创建两个组件

react/no-redundant-should-component-upda.name: react/no-redundant-should-component-update
react/no-redundant-should-component-upda.description: 禁止在 React.PureComponent 中使用 shouldComponentUpdate
react/no-redundant-should-component-upda.badExample: class Foo extends React.PureComponent { shouldComponentUpdate() {} }
react/no-redundant-should-component-upda.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { shouldComponentUpdate() {} }

react/no-render-return-value.name: react/no-render-return-value
react/no-render-return-value.description: 禁止使用 ReactDOM.render 的返回值
react/no-render-return-value.badExample: const app = ReactDOM.render(<App />, document.getElementById('app'));
react/no-render-return-value.goodExample: ReactDOM.render(<App />, document.getElementById('app'));

react/no-string-refs.name: react/no-string-refs
react/no-string-refs.badExample: class Foo { componentDidMount() { console.log(this.refs.foo); } render() { return <div ref="foo" />; } }
react/no-string-refs.goodExample: import { useRef, useEffect } from 'react'; function Foo() { const foo = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { console.log(foo); }); return <div ref={foo} />; }

react/no-this-in-sfc.name: react/no-this-in-sfc
react/no-this-in-sfc.description: 禁止在函数组件中使用 this
react/no-this-in-sfc.badExample: function Foo() { return <div>{this.props.foo}</div>; }
react/no-this-in-sfc.goodExample: function Foo(props) { return <div>{props.foo}</div>; }

react/no-typos.name: react/no-typos
react/no-typos.description: 禁止组件的属性或生命周期大小写错误
react/no-typos.badExample: class Foo extends React.Component { static defaultprops = {}; componentdidupdate() {} }
react/no-typos.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { static defaultProps = {}; componentDidUpdate() {} }

react/no-unescaped-entities.name: react/no-unescaped-entities
react/no-unescaped-entities.description: 禁止在组件的内部存在未转义的 >, ", ' 或 }
react/no-unescaped-entities.badExample: <Foo>Hel>lo</Foo>;
react/no-unescaped-entities.goodExample: <Foo>Hel>lo</Foo>;

react/no-unknown-property.name: react/no-unknown-property
react/no-unknown-property.description: 禁止出现 HTML 中的属性，如 class
react/no-unknown-property.badExample: <div class="foo" />;
react/no-unknown-property.goodExample: <div className="foo" />;

react/no-unsafe.name: react/no-unsafe
react/no-unsafe.description: 禁止使用不安全的生命周期方法 componentWillMount, componentWillReceiveProps, componentWillUpdate
react/no-unsafe.badExample: eslint(react/no-unsafe)">class Foo extends React.Component { componentWillMount() {} UNSAFE_componentWillMount() {} }
react/no-unsafe.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component {}

react/no-unused-prop-types.name: react/no-unused-prop-types
react/no-unused-prop-types.description: 禁止出现未使用的 propTypes
react/no-unused-prop-types.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

react/no-unused-state.name: react/no-unused-state
react/no-unused-state.description: 已定义的 state 必须使用
react/no-unused-state.reason: 没有官方文档，并且存在很多 bug：https://github.com/yannickcr/eslint-plugin-react/search?q=no-unused-state&type=Issues&utf8=%E2%9C%93

react/no-will-update-set-state.name: react/no-will-update-set-state
react/no-will-update-set-state.description: 禁止在 componentWillUpdate 中使用 setState
react/no-will-update-set-state.reason: 已经禁止使用 componentWillUpdate 了

react/prefer-es6-class.name: react/prefer-es6-class
react/prefer-es6-class.description: 必须使用 Class 的形式创建组件
react/prefer-es6-class.badExample: const Foo = createReactClass({ render() { return <div />; }, });
react/prefer-es6-class.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { render() { return <div />; } }

react/prefer-read-only-props.name: react/prefer-read-only-props
react/prefer-read-only-props.description: 使用 Flow 时，props 必须设置为只读的

react/prop-types.name: react/prop-types
react/prop-types.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

react/react-in-jsx-scope.name: react/react-in-jsx-scope
react/react-in-jsx-scope.description: 出现 jsx 的地方必须导入 React
react/react-in-jsx-scope.reason: 已经在 no-undef 中限制了

react/require-default-props.name: react/require-default-props
react/require-default-props.description: 非 required 的 prop 必须有 defaultProps
react/require-default-props.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

react/require-render-return.name: react/require-render-return
react/require-render-return.description: render 方法中必须有返回值
react/require-render-return.badExample: class Foo extends React.Component { render() { <div />; } }
react/require-render-return.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { render() { return <div />; } }

react/self-closing-comp.name: react/self-closing-comp
react/self-closing-comp.description: 组件内没有 children 时，必须使用自闭和写法
react/self-closing-comp.badExample: <Foo></Foo>; <div></div>;
react/self-closing-comp.goodExample: <Foo>Not empty</Foo>; <div>Not empty</div>; <Bar />; <div />;

react/sort-comp.name: react/sort-comp
react/sort-comp.description: 组件内方法必须按照一定规则排序
react/sort-comp.badExample: class Foo extends React.Component { render() { return <div />; } componentWillUnmount() {} componentDidMount() {} constructor() {} static defaultProps = {}; }
react/sort-comp.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { static defaultProps = {}; constructor() {} componentDidMount() {} componentWillUnmount() {} render() { return <div />; } }

react/sort-prop-types.name: react/sort-prop-types
react/sort-prop-types.description: propTypes 的属性必须按照字母排序
react/sort-prop-types.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

react/state-in-constructor.name: react/state-in-constructor
react/state-in-constructor.description: 必须在构造函数中初始化 state

react/static-property-placement.name: react/static-property-placement
react/static-property-placement.description: 类的静态属性必须使用 static 关键字定义
react/static-property-placement.badExample: class Foo extends React.Component {} Foo.defaultProps = {};
react/static-property-placement.goodExample: class Foo extends React.Component { static defaultProps = {}; }

react/style-prop-object.name: react/style-prop-object
react/style-prop-object.description: style 属性的取值必须是 object
react/style-prop-object.badExample: <div style="color: 'red'" />;
react/style-prop-object.goodExample: <div style={{ color: 'red' }} />;

react/void-dom-elements-no-children.name: react/void-dom-elements-no-children
react/void-dom-elements-no-children.description: img, br 标签中禁止有 children
react/void-dom-elements-no-children.badExample: <img>foo</img>; <br>bar</br>;
react/void-dom-elements-no-children.goodExample: <img />; <br />; <div>foo</div>;
